00058         virtual void save(StreamSerialiser& stream) = 0;

00073     class _OgrePagingExport PageStrategy : public PageAlloc
00074     {
00075     protected:
00076         String mName;
00077         PageManager* mManager;
00078     public:
00079         PageStrategy(const String& name, PageManager* manager)
00080             : mName(name), mManager(manager)
00081         {
00082 
00083         }
00084 
00085         virtual ~PageStrategy() {}
00086 
00087         const String& getName() const { return mName; }
00088         PageManager* getManager() const { return mManager; }
00089 
00091         virtual void frameStart(Real timeSinceLastFrame, PagedWorldSection* section) {}
00093         virtual void frameEnd(Real timeElapsed, PagedWorldSection* section) {}
00102         virtual void notifyCamera(Camera* cam, PagedWorldSection* section) {}
00103 
00110         virtual PageStrategyData* createData() = 0;
00111 
00118         virtual void destroyData(PageStrategyData* d) = 0;
00119 
00126         virtual void updateDebugDisplay(Page* p, SceneNode* sn) = 0;
00127
